channel.title: 🏢 Duke University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Duke University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Navigating the Effect of Parametrization for Dimensionality Reduction
item.description: ParamRepulsor, a novel parametric dimensionality reduction method, achieves state-of-the-art local structure preservation by mining hard negatives and using a tailored loss function.
